issues.description: The problem statement explicitly requires the calculateTotalPrice method to be static, as it uses the shared stock attribute. However, in the solution repository, this method is implemented as a non-static instance method. This discrepancy could confuse students who follow the problem statement, leading to implementation errors when trying to match the solution structure.
issues.suggested_fix: Modify the calculateTotalPrice method in the solution repository to be declared as static to align with the problem statement, ensuring students are not confused about the intended visibility and can implement it correctly.

issues.description: Within the problem statement, the calculateTotalPrice method is described as static in the text, but the UML diagram only indicates it as public without specifying static. This internal contradiction could mislead students about whether the method should be static or an instance method, creating confusion in the design interpretation.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the problem statement to consistently describe the calculateTotalPrice method in the UML diagram as static, or clarify in the text that the UML focuses on visibility without implying non-static status, to eliminate ambiguity for students.
